h4.span: Capital School District Announcements and Information about COVID-19

td.p: Below you will find quick links to important information about Capital School District and the Coronavirus in Delaware. Please visit http://bit.ly/csdstayhealthy for the latest information and announcements.

img.alt: Capital School District Strategic Intent Logo - #1 in Delaware
img.title: Capital School District Strategic Intent Logo - #1 in Delaware

div.img:
Capital School District is committed to working to meet the needs of our students and our community. Through a comprehensive process that involved multiple stakeholders in the community and support of the Capital School District Board of Education, we have focused our work in 3 key areas of Strategic Intent.
Intent #1
Intent #2
Intent #3
Linear and Streamlined District Meeting the needs
of the whole child Senator Pride
Learn more about each of these by following the links above or viewing our mini-site.

div.div:
CapitalSchool District
Home of the Senators | Dover, Delaware

div.p: The Capital School District is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth and related medical conditions), national origin, citizenship or ancestry, age, disability, marital status, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, or gender identity, against victims of domestic violence, sexual offenses, or stalking, or upon any other categories protected by federal, state, or local law. Inquiries regarding nondiscrimination policies should be directed to the Title IX, District 504 and ADA Coordinators: Capital School District, 198 Commerce Way, Dover DE 19904. Phone 302-672-1500
